Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I try to treat AI as a potential aid for my assessment but I don’t always let it be my definitive aid. It’s easier than trying to reach professors and teachers for feedback for a draft.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI felt more helpful because it tells me how my work relates to reading comprehension. I don’t get this sort of feedback from teachers
